features.name: Plastic Recycling
features.description: Facilities that process and recycle various types of plastic materials.

features.name: E-Waste Collection
features.description: Programs for collecting and recycling electronic waste like computers and phones.

features.name: Composting Services
features.description: Services that turn organic waste into compost, reducing landfill waste.

features.name: Glass Bottle Return
features.description: Deposit systems for returning glass bottles to promote reuse and recycling.

features.name: Battery Recycling
features.description: Collection points for recycling batteries safely to prevent hazardous waste.

features.name: Community Clean-Up Events
features.description: Local events aimed at cleaning up public spaces and promoting recycling awareness.
